## Role.is() method

Check if this role either is, or is a subclass of, the role with the specified name.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
is<N extends Role.Name>(name: N): this is Role<N | Role.SubclassOf<N>>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | N |  |
